page.title: 03RESIDENTS IN LOSCOE
page.content: The majority of the people which we interviewed had been living in the Heanor area for over ten years. We asked each of them if they liked it in this area. They mostly said yes, but they disliked the lack of buses and the hills seemed to be a problem because every thing was uphill. But despite that they said that they were pleased and reasonably happy with the area. The main thing which attracted them to the area was the lack of traffic and the peacefulness. The opencast did not seem to affect most of the people interviewed. Most of the houses consist of three or more bedrooms and most houses had a garage, though there are some areas of much older housing.
